survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Subscription-Based Pet Food Delivery
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction with subscription-based pet food delivery services, including product quality, delivery experience, and overall service.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the pet food received through the subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the quality of the pet food received through the subscription service?

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with the delivery of your pet food subscription?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale. Ensure readability on all devices.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with the delivery of your pet food subscription?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in your pet food subscription service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question with a limit of 3 selections. Optimize for mobile.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-choice (checkboxes with max 3 selections)

script.question_text: What features do you value most in your pet food subscription service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this pet food subscription service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for Net Promoter Score (NPS) calculation.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this pet food subscription service to others?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the pet food subscription service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question for qualitative feedback. Allow for long-text input.

script.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the pet food subscription service.
